name: Ensure hebel installed plumb & level with adjoining surfaces
Ensure gap between hebel & concrete 10?15mm (max) & consistent
Ensure hebel panels are in full & not cracked
Final sign off - All hebel work completed as per the above ITP
Ensure to use right dulux product & system as per specification & scope of works
Expansion cuts are consistent up & down & to substrate & also same cut thickness
Ensure surfaces flat & level & free of imperfections
Once render applied ? render allowed to sufficiently dry before primer coat
Primer Coat ? even consistent coverage on render
Membrane Texture Coat ? consistent coverage & texture, no roller marks, consistent sheen level
Paint thickness test to be carried out & report to be crossed checked DGain Alands external render & paint specification schedule
Final sign off - All render work completed as per the above ITP
HOLDPOINT - Once all above items have been signed off work may proceed
